titleStmt.title: Theologia veterum, or, The summe of Christian theologie, positive, polemical, and philological, contained in the Apostles creed, or reducible to it according to the tendries of the antients both Greeks and Latines : in three books / by Peter Heylyn.
titleStmt.author: Heylyn, Peter, 1600-1662.

titleStmt.title: Theologia veterum, or, The summe of Christian theologie, positive, polemical, and philological, contained in the Apostles creed, or reducible to it according to the tendries of the antients both Greeks and Latines : in three books / by Peter Heylyn.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: 20 p. at end lacking in filmed copy.
Added t.p. on p. [1] following prelim. p. [36]: The summe of Christian theologie.
Each book has special t.p.; books 2 and 3 have title: The summe of Christian theologie.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
